May '19 - Aug '19

Mechanical Engineer Intern | Neyveli Lignite Corporation, Neyveli, TamilNadu — Led team to assess and maintain water circulating pump through coatings. Research Survey on Improved circulating water pump efficiency with a payback period of < 2 months.


Publications


Nov '21 - Jan '22

Design of Autonomous Carrier Robot - Task and Validation | Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. — A robotic prototype equipped with a white line sensor follows predefined paths, detects and navigates around obstacles, and performs various material handling tasks, specifically designed for applications in production and healthcare environments with a focus on General Hospital operations.

Aug '21 - Nov '21

Energy Efficient Coatings for Improved Wear and Tear Performance | Neyveli Lignite Corporation, TamilNadu — The application of polymer coating in circulating water pumps’ hydraulic passages increased pump efficiency from 84.17% to 88.42%, handling a higher flow rate and saving power for the NLCIL plant in southern India
